# A Thousand Skins (Feat)
## Overview
You know deeper secrets of personal illusions, allowing you to hide yourself in a crowd.

**Prerequisites:** Wis 15+, [[A Thousand Shades (Feat)|A Thousand Shades]], divine spellcaster level 5th+.

**Benefit:** You may cast *[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]]* at will, as a spellcaster equal to your character level.

**Special:** Druid characters waive the prerequisites for this feat (except [[A Thousand Shades (Feat)|A Thousand Shades]]), being able to take it at any level.

**Source:** Feats (AEG), pg. 130
